title: i got a 24 hour ban from buying RP, 5 days later still cant.
body: i couldnt buy RP today because it said i have a 24 hour ban then i came back 1 and a half days later still couldnt and then i cam back 4 days later i still cant ive changed credit cards i have even tried to use online visa cards till dont work help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (the link shows a picture that is the exact same to mine)

replies.body: Hey Draconicscar, I wanted to follow up with you to see if you were able to get this issue resolved. Let me know if you're having any issues or have any questions!

Hey there,

You'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support about this issue, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific issues.
